data.text:
@ACLUVA Covid sucks. 

Kids should have options. If they don’t want to deal with covid, they should certainly be allowed an option. 

Free Virginia online learning comes to mind. 

Covid sucks.

@ACLUVA Have a fantastic day in court!! When will there be any results? Please keep us updated!! We need to be good neighbors to our vulnerable. This shouldn’t be in the political realm; it’s a medical and public health issue. Thank you!!
@ACLUVA What accommodations did they ask for, short of universal forced masking, from their school?
